 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְרֹחַ‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Job.39.30|Job 39:30]]</sup> young one, plural ==young ones, young==, of birds (Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְרֹחִים‎</span> [[Deut.22.6|Deut 22:6]] (twice in verse); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְרֹחָו‎</span> [[Job.39.30|Job 39:30]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְרֹחֶיהָ‎</span> [[Ps.84.4|Ps 84:4]].
